author: thomasm
msg: OAK-45 Add support for branching and merging - wrapper to simplify testing with MicroKernel implementations that don't support branch and merge

author: danhaywood
msg: ISIS-48, plus some changes to Wicket; simple updates now working
runtime
- a mechanism for adding exceptions to a list on IsisTransaction
- fixed race condition in IsisTransactionManager for startTran
- removed PersistenceSessionHydrator, methods entirely moved into AdapterManager
- introduced PojoRecreator interface to allow object store to hook into adapter recreation process
JDO
- facet factories
- moved JdoPropertyUtils from metamodel into JDO's runtime
- lazy loading, reuse code in the IsisLifecycleListener
In wicket
- removing SpecMemento and replacing with ObjectSpecId
- getting the choices dropdown to correctly setup the value

author: brane
msg: * CHANGES: Add node about "svn --version --verbose".

author: pkluegl
msg: UIMA-2329
- added analysis engine for html documents in utils folder
- instantiated types for most well-known tags
- add annotations for content or complete element
- able to strip html, but still adds annotations of removed tags
- organized imports

author: brane
msg: Add module version info to "svn --version --verbose" output on Windows.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/sysinfo.c (file_version_number): New.
(win32_shared_libs): Make static. Display module version when available.
